title: I think I am in love GD
body:
THere is this super tall computer engineer in my software engineering class. He is like 6'4 and tall and usually sports a beard and has dark hair and sjbdjdjsjdhu+-Ã—hJb+j/+h-;ghwksbsknsenfbofjwkabhsnehs.

Anyhow when we talk he is super into the convo yet when I say something stupid he becomes so tusndere and rude for a bit. Yet he always sits right in front of me (ooh yes).



That is the HOTTEST thing ever. I love a guy who will call me out on my shit. It happens SO RARELY (IRL. On here I get it all damn day).

Omg smart tall guys with beards. Who call me out on my shit and become tsundere.

Omg. The best.

Omg. My hart.
